ticker: Join us for live DJs mixing every Saturday night!
Follow us on Bluesky for all event announcements!
Check out our new wall art around the station! Some old 1.0 favs return and new pieces by Flightlessbird3!
We are now on the nicer website! Use the new button on the station concourse and follow us @bassstationvr.bsky.social

performers.name: DJ Keppy
ticker: First train tonight departing for Hardstyle

performers.name: Bassdrop
ticker: For those who missed the first train, this DJ is now also bound for Hardstyle!
'Remember, no man is a failure who has friends.'
Follow Bassdrop on Bluesky @celerontheprotogen.bsky.social or Twitter @CeleronTheProto

performers.name: Subverja
ticker: Now departing from Platform 2, this DJ is a direct service to Drum and Bass
Follow Subverga on Bluesky @subverja.bsky.social or Twitter @subverja

performers.name: Japhet
ticker: Our final train this evening with an express service to Mainstage
'Remember to be the change you want to see'
Follow Japhet at Bluesky @japhetbeans.bsky.social or Twitter @MSGspike

performers.name: **TERMINATES HERE**
ticker: This event terminates here. We wish you the best with your onward musical journey!
Passengers are reminded to remain hydrated at all times and shower the DJ with good vibes and your emotes at frequent intervals.
We're now on Bluesky! Follow us @bassstationvr.bsky.social
